DeviceSettingsPage.DownloadOnMeteredConn: If users on this device are using Kolibri with a limited data plan, they may have to pay extra charges on a mobile connection.

DeviceSettingsPage.alertDisabledPaths: This Kolibri is not set up to manage its own resource files locally.
DeviceSettingsPage.alertDisabledPlugins: This Kolibri is not able to initiate a restart from the user interface - management of the enabled pages will have to happen from the command line, and Kolibri will have to be restarted manually.
DeviceSettingsPage.allowDownload: Allow download on a mobile connection
DeviceSettingsPage.allowExternalConnecti: Allow others in the network to access Kolibri on this device using a browser
If learners are allowed to sign in with no password on this device, enabling this may allow external devices to view the user data, which could be a potential security concern.
DeviceSettingsPage.allowGuestAccess: Allow users to explore resources without signing in
DeviceSettingsPage.allowLearnersDownload: Allow users to explore resources they don't have, and mark them for Kolibri to automatically download when available in their network.
DeviceSettingsPage.disallowGuestAccess: Learners must sign in to explore resources
DeviceSettingsPage.doNotAllowDownload: Do not allow download on a mobile connection
DeviceSettingsPage.enableAutoDownloadDes: Kolibri will automatically download assigned lessons, quizzes, and other resources on the 'My downloads' list.
DeviceSettingsPage.facilitySettings: You can also configure facility settings
DeviceSettingsPage.lockedContent: Signed in learners should only see resources assigned to them in classes
DeviceSettingsPage.pageDescription: The changes you make here will affect this device only.
DeviceSettingsPage.primaryStorageDescrip: Kolibri channels are stored here. Newly downloaded resources will be added to this location.
DeviceSettingsPage.secondaryStorageDescr: Kolibri will display channels stored in these locations. Read-only locations cannot be the primary storage location.

DeviceSettingsPage.setStorageLimitDescri: Kolibri will not auto-download more than a set amount of remaining storage on the device
